shape.name: 进程
shape.vmldata: <v:Rect name="shapeElement" style="position:absolute;width:200;height:200;" > <v:fill name="shapeFill" type="gradient" rotate='t' angle="0" focus="100%" color="#A6BED0" /> </v:Rect>

shape.name: 判定
shape.vmldata: <v:shape name="shapeElement" style="width:200;height:200;" path="m 0,100 l 100,200,200,100,100,0,0,100 x e"> <v:fill name="shapeFill" type="gradient" rotate='t' angle="0" focus="100%" color="#A6BED0" /> </v:shape>

shape.name: 准备
shape.vmldata: <v:shape name="shapeElement" style="position:absolute;width:200;height:200;" path="m 0,100 l 50,200,150,200,200,100,150,0,50,0,0,100 x e" > <v:fill name="shapeFill" type="gradient" rotate='t' angle="0" focus="100%" color="#A6BED0" /> </v:shape>

shape.name: 开始/结束
shape.vmldata: <v:oval name="shapeElement" style="position:absolute;width:200;height:200;" > <v:fill name="shapeFill" type="gradient" rotate='t' angle="0" focus="100%" color="#A6BED0" /> </v:oval>

shape.name: 文档
shape.vmldata: <v:shape name="shapeElement" style="position:absolute;width:200;height:200;" path="m 0,0 l 0,180 c 0,180,50,200,100,200 c 100,200,150,163,200,200 l 200,0 x e" > <v:fill name="shapeFill" type="gradient" rotate='t' angle="0" focus="100%" color="#A6BED0" /> </v:shape>
